In case you are interest in buying map art, 
*[Independent Map Sellers](https://mapartists.org/)* is a nice curated shopping 
guide offered by the *Independent Map Artists*. The guide features the work of 
more than 50 independent cartographers whose work can be bought. Articles 
include prints, 3D maps, apparel, and more.

Some examples:

![The Swiss Trains Map by [Kumo](https://www.kumocorp.ch/boutique/p/swiss-trains-map-poster)](kumo-swiss-trains-map.jpg "The Swiss Trains Map by Kumo")

![Map of the Isle of Skye by [Mapelio](https://mapelio.com/products/isle-of-skye-fine-art-contour-map)](mapelio-isle-of-skye.png "Map of the Isle of Skye by Mapelio")

![Map of Lake Geneva by [Boilisé](https://www.boilise.com/en/products/lac-leman)](boilise-lake-geneva.jpg "Map of Lake Geneva by Boilisé")

![Buildings of Amsterdam map by [Let's make a map](https://letsmakeamap.gumroad.com/)](buildings-of-amsterdam-letsmakeamap.jpg "Buildings of Amsterdam map by Let's make a map")
